q: how safe is this activity of tug-of-war
pred: The activity of tug-of-war is generally considered safe, as long as it is practiced under proper supervision and with the right equipment. However, it is essential to follow safety guidelines and ensure that the ropes are of appropriate length and strength, and that the participants are wearing appropriate safety gear such as helmets and padded gloves. Additionally, it is crucial to ensure that the participants are well-trained and understand the rules of the game to avoid injuries.
